synopsis.text: When Saki, a fresh college student, finds herself attending the same university as her sister's ex-boyfriend, Kaname, she is faced with the challenge of confronting her secret feelings for him. In an attempt to move on from her unrequited love, she joins Kaname's video club, only to find herself caught in a web of romantic complications. As Kaname expresses interest in filming her, another club member, Daichi, harbors hidden feelings for her as well. Torn between her lingering affection for Kaname and the potential for a new love with Daichi, Saki must navigate the complexities of college life and relationships in this captivating anime. Will true love prevail, or will the tangled web of emotions prove too much to handle?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
